name: Too Many Cooks (itch) (TommyBomby, Luvik)
description:
The brand new burger restaurant is opening! You hired the best cooks, each one with its own specialty: meat, cheese, salad...

Let's cook!

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • P: grab / drop
  • O: work
  • Q: switch to next cook

Music credits : "Happy Arcade Tune" and "Puzzle tune 1" by rezoner (https://soundcloud.com/rezoner) , Choro Bavario by MSTR
